---

<h1 align="center">React Tailwind Demo Project</img></h1>

This project is a simple React application styled using Tailwind CSS. The purpose of this project is to demonstrate the integration of Tailwind CSS with a React application and showcase some of the UI components and styles that can be created using Tailwind.

---

## Table of Contents

- [Getting Started](#getting-started)
  - [Installation](#installation)
  - [Usage](#usage)
  - [Scripts](#scripts)
- [Resources](#resources)
- [License](#license)
- [Credits](#credits)

## Getting Started

### Installation

To get started with this project, follow these steps:

1. Clone the repository:

```shell
git clone https://github.com/scottgriv/react-tailwind-demo_project.git
```

2. Navigate to the project directory:

```shell
cd react-tailwind-project
```

3. Install the dependencies:

```shell
npm install
```

### Usage

After installing the dependencies, you can start the development server with:

```shell
npm start
```

This will run the app in development mode. Open `http://localhost:3000` to view it in the browser.

### Scripts

The available scripts in this project are:

- `npm start`: Starts the development server.
- `npm build`: Builds the app for production.
- `npm test`: Runs the test suite.
- `npm eject`: Ejects the Create React App configuration (use with caution).

**React**

- [React Official Site](https://reactjs.org)
- [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/getting-started.html)
- [Create React App](https://create-react-app.dev/)
- [React Router](https://reactrouter.com/)
- [React Hooks](https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-intro.html)
- [Codecademy's React Course](https://www.codecademy.com/learn/react-101)
- [FreeCodeCamp's React Guide](https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/the-react-handbook-b71c27b0a795/)

**Tailwind CSS**

- [Tailwind CSS Official Site](https://tailwindcss.com)
- [Tailwind CSS Official Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs)
- [Tailwind CSS Setup with Create React App](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/guides/create-react-app)
- [Tailwind CSS Components](https://tailwindui.com/)
- [Awesome Tailwind CSS](https://github.com/aniftyco/awesome-tailwindcss)
- [Tailwind Toolbox](https://www.tailwindtoolbox.com/)
- [Tailwind CSS Cheat Sheet](https://nerdcave.com/tailwind-cheat-sheet)

**Combined**

- [Tailwind CSS and React Tutorial](https://dev.to/davidmelhado/setting-up-tailwind-css-in-a-react-project-2ba0)
- [Building a React Application with Tailwind CSS](https://blog.logrocket.com/building-a-react-application-with-tailwind-css/)
